resources.string: Graduation day is a hallmark event for KCT, giving us the opportunity to come together to reflect upon our mission, legacy and to celebrate the achievements of our talented graduands. Thousands have passed out of this great institution with degrees over the last 33 years and have launched successful careers. It gives immense pleasure to us in KCT management, staff and students in welcoming each of you graduands to this year\'s graduation ceremony.
